title: Andrew's Monotone Chain (Convex Hull)
subtitle: Compute convex hull of a set of 2D points in O(n log n)
code: while len(lower) >= 2 and cross(lower[-2], lower[-1], p) <= 0:
while len(upper) >= 2 and cross(upper[-2], upper[-1], p) <= 0:
additional_information: Constructs convex hull by building lower and upper chains. Handles collinear points by exclusion (<= 0 condition).
